actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the States to provide financial assistance to religiously affiliated schools.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Proposes an amendment to the Constitution which provides that no State shall be barred by the prohibition of the first article of amendment, respecting the establishment of religion, from providing financial assistance to a religiously affiliated school.

titles.title: A bill proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the States to provide financial assistance to religiously affiliated schools.
